languages.text: {n}Джай задумчиво кивает.{/n} "Я не сомневаюсь в том, что, рано или поздно, вам придется иметь дело с ксеносами. В тот час, шерин, вы возблагодарите {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Великого{/g} за то, что он послал меня вам!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Джай задумчиво кивает.{/n} "Я не сомневаюсь в том, что, рано или поздно, вам придется иметь дело с ксеносами. В тот час, шерин, вы возблагодарите {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Великого{/g} за то, что он послал меня вам!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae nods thoughtfully.{/n} "I have no doubt you will have to deal with xenos sooner or later. When that time comes, shereen, you will thank the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Exalted One{/g} for sending me to stand at your side!"
languages.original_text: {n}Джай задумчиво кивает.{/n} "Я не сомневаюсь в том, что, рано или поздно, вам придется иметь дело с ксеносами. В тот час, шерин, вы возблагодарите {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Великого{/g} за то, что он послал меня вам!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae nods thoughtfully.{/n} "I have no doubt you will have to deal with maadari sooner or later. When this time comes, shereen, you will thank the Great One for sending me to stand at your side!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae nods thoughtfully.{/n} "I have no doubt you will have to deal with maadari sooner or later. When this time comes, shereen, you will thank the Great One for sending me to stand at your side!"

traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae nods thoughtfully.{/n} "I have no doubt you will have to deal with xenos sooner or later. When that time comes, shereen, you will thank the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Exalted One{/g} for sending me to stand at your side!"

languages.text: {n}婕伊若有所思地点点头。{/n}“你迟早要与异形打交道，我对此非常确信。当与异形打交道的时刻到来时，亲爱的，你会感谢{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}至高无上的神皇{/g}把我派到了你的身边！”
languages.original_text: {n}Jae nods thoughtfully.{/n} "I have no doubt you will have to deal with xenos sooner or later. When that time comes, shereen, you will thank the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Exalted One{/g} for sending me to stand at your side!"

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊若有所思地点点头。{/n}“你迟要与异形打交道，我对此非常确信。当与异形打交道的时刻到来时，亲爱的，你会感谢{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}至高无上的神皇{/g}把我派到了你的身边！”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Jae nods thoughtfully.{/n} "I have no doubt you will have to deal with xenos sooner or later. When that time comes, shereen, you will thank the Exalted One for sending me to stand at your side!"

languages.text: {n}Jae asiente, pensativa.{/n} «No me cabe duda de que tendrá que tratar con xenos tarde o temprano. ¡Cuando llegue el momento, shereen, le agradecerá al {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Exaltado{/g} que me haya enviado a ayudar{mf|le|la}!».
languages.original_text: {n}Jae nods thoughtfully.{/n} "I have no doubt you will have to deal with xenos sooner or later. When that time comes, shereen, you will thank the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Exalted One{/g} for sending me to stand at your side!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae asiente, pensativa.{/n} «No me cabe duda de que tendrá que tratar con xenos tarde o temprano. ¡Cuando llegue el momento, shereen, le agradecerá al {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Exaltado{/g} que me haya enviado a ayudar{mf|le|la}!».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}ジェイは考え込むようにうなずいた。{/n}「遅かれ早かれ、異種族を相手にしなければならないのは間違いない。そのときが来たら、あんたはあたしを味方に立たせてくれた{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}エグザルテッド・ワン{/g}に感謝することになるさ！」
languages.original_text: {n}Jae nods thoughtfully.{/n} "I have no doubt you will have to deal with xenos sooner or later. When that time comes, shereen, you will thank the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Exalted One{/g} for sending me to stand at your side!"

traits.locale_text: {n}ジェイは考え込むようにうなずいた。{/n}「遅かれ早かれ、異種族を相手にしなければならないのは間違いない。そのときが来たら、あんたはあたしを味方に立たせてくれた{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}エグザルテッド・ワン{/g}に感謝することになるさ！」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae nickt nachdenklich.{/n} "Ihr werdet gewiss früher oder später mit Xenos zu tun bekommen. Wenn dieser Augenblick kommt, Shereen, werdet Ihr dem {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Erhabenen{/g} danken, dass er mich an Eure Seite geschickt hat!"
languages.original_text: {n}Jae nods thoughtfully.{/n} "I have no doubt you will have to deal with xenos sooner or later. When that time comes, shereen, you will thank the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Exalted One{/g} for sending me to stand at your side!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae nickt nachdenklich.{/n} "Ihr werdet gewiss früher oder später mit Xenos zu tun bekommen. Wenn dieser Augenblick kommt, Shereen, werdet Ihr dem {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Erhabenen{/g} danken, dass er mich an Eure Seite geschickt hat!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae opine pensivement.{/n} « Il ne fait aucun doute que nous aurons affaire à des xénos tôt ou tard. Quand ce moment viendra, shereen, vous remercierez l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Exalté{/g} de m'avoir envoyée à vous ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Jae nods thoughtfully.{/n} "I have no doubt you will have to deal with xenos sooner or later. When that time comes, shereen, you will thank the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Exalted One{/g} for sending me to stand at your side!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae opine pensivement.{/n} « Il ne fait aucun doute que nous aurons affaire à des xénos tôt ou tard. Quand ce moment viendra, shereen, vous remercierez l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Exalté{/g} de m'avoir envoyée à vous ! »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae, düşünceli bir tavırla başını eğiyor.{/n} "Er ya da geç zenolarla muhatap olman gerekeceğine şüphem yok. O gün geldiğinde {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Görkemli{/g} beni yanına gönderdiği için şükredeceksin şirinim!"
languages.original_text: {n}Jae nods thoughtfully.{/n} "I have no doubt you will have to deal with xenos sooner or later. When that time comes, shereen, you will thank the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Exalted One{/g} for sending me to stand at your side!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae düşünceli bir tavırla başını eğiyor.{/n} "Er ya da geç zenolarla muhatap olman gerekeceğine şüphem yok. O gün geldiğinde {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Görkemli{/g} beni yanına gönderdiği için şükredeceksin şirinim!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
